content: Shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Innum ee aayushkaalatthum nammude addhyakshanmaaraayirunnu naalu bhaagangallilumulllla daivatthinte vishuddhasabhakalle meyichu bharikkunna shuddhimaanmaarum bahumaanappettavarum, bhaagyavaanmaarumaayi daivatthaal nilanirtthappettuporunna nammude paathriyarkkeesanmaaraaya aaboon maar ignaatthiyosinu vendiyum (moraan maar basseliyosu maartthommaa maathyoosu thrthiyan) kaatholikkaa baavaaykkuvendiyum aaboon maar greegoriyosinuvendiyum nammude melppattakkaaran aaboon maar (innaarkk) vendiyum, sathya vishvaasikallaaya sheshamulllla sakala eppiskoppanmaarkku vendiyum mahatthum bhayangkaravum, parishuddhavumaaya ee samayatthu daivamaaya kartthaavinodu naam apekshichu praarththhikkaam.

Shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Sarvvashakthiyulllla daivamaaya kartthaave, palavidhamaaya kadhinapareekshakallil akappettu ninnil aashrayichirikkunnavarude rakshaykku vendiyum vegatthil nee avare darshikkunnathinuvendiyum ee naazhikayilum, ee samayatthum nyangall orkkuvaanaayittu nissaararum balaheenarumaaya nyangallodu munkootti kalpichu nyangalle thaalpparyappedutthiyittulllla vishvaasikallum sathyakristhyaanikallumaaya nyangallude sahodarangalle ellaavareyum nyangall orkkunnu. Daivatthaal paalikkappettirikkunna ee vishuddhasabhayude makkallaakunna vishvaasikallaaya ellaavarkkum anyonyam aikyavum abhivrddhiyum undaakuvaanaayittum avar sukrthamullllavaraayittheeruvaanaayittum kartthaavinodu naam praarththhikkanam.

Shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Naalu bhaagangallilumulllla daivatthinte sabhakalleyum dayaraakalleyum sathyavishvaasatthil nilanirtthi urappicha, vishvaasikallum sathyakristhyaanikallumaaya sakala bharanakartthaakkalleyum nyangall orkkunnu. Pattakkaarum vishvaasikallaaya janangallude samghavum kristhyaanisamooham muzhuvanum sukrthamullllavaraayittheeruvaanaayittu kartthaavinodu naam praarththhikkanam.

Shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Bhoomiyile sakala vamshangallilninnu bhaagyangallkkyogyathayullllavallum vishuddhiyullllavallum, mahatthvamullllavallum anugrahikkappettavallum, nithyakanyakayum bhaagyavathiyumaaya daivamaathaavaaya mariyaamine nyangall orkkunnu. Avallodukoode parishuddhamaaraaya nibiyanmaareyum, prasamgakkaaraaya shleehanmaareyum evangelisthanmaareyum, sahadenmaareyum, maudyaananmaareyum bhaagyavaanum thante yajamaanante munnottakkaaranumaaya maar yoohaanon maamdaanayeyum shemmaashanmaaril pradhaaniyum, sahadenmaaril mumpanumaaya parishuddhanum, mahatthvamullllavanumaaya maar stheppaanosineyum shleehanmaaril thalavanmaaraaya unnathappetta maar pathrosineyum maar pauloosineyum nammude kaaval pithaavaaya maartthommaa shleehaayeyum shesham sakala shuddhimaanmaareyum shuddhimathikalleyum onnupole naam orkkanam. Avarude praarththhana namukku kottayaayirikkatte. Kartthaavinodu naam praarththhikkanam.

Shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Shlaihikavum kuttamillaatthathumaaya ekavishvaasatthe paalichu nyangallkku elppichu thannavaraaya shuddhimaanmaarude sthhalatthu shuddhathayode mumpukootti nidrapraapichu vishramikkunnavareyum nikhyaayilum kusthanteenopoleesilum eppesosilum vachundaaya punyappettavayum, parishuddhangallumaaya moonnu pothusunnahadosukalleyum, avayilundaayirunna neethimaanmaarum, malppaanmaarum sthuthikkappettavarum, daivatthe dharichavarumaaya nyangallude pithaakkanmaareyum oorshleminte onnaamatthe pradhaanaachaaryanum, punyavaanum shleehaayum sahadaayumaaya yaakkobum, ignaathyosum, kleemmeesum deevannaasyosum, atthaanaasyosum yooliyosum, basseliyosum greegoriyosum, deeyaskorosum theemotthiyosum, peelaksinosum anteemosum, eeyaavaaneesum vachanamaaya Daivam shareeriyaayittheernnuvennu nammude kartthaaveshumishihaayude manushyaavathaaratthekkurichu spashdamaayi thelliyichavanum sathyavaanum, unnathagopuravumaaya prasiddhanaaya maar koorilosum suriyaanikkaarude kireedavum daivatthinte vishuddhasabha muzhuvanteyum vivekamulllla vaayum, thoonum, malppaanum pushpangall kondu niranya mechilsthhalavum mariyaam samshayam koodaathe daivamaathaavennu ellaayppozhum prasamgichavanumaaya nyangallude paathriyarkkeesu maar severiyosum sathya vishvaasatthe nilanirtthiya neethimaanum parishuddhanumaaya nyangallude baavaa maar yaakkobu burdaanaayum maar apremum, maar yaakkobum maar ishaakkum, maar baalaayiyum duഃkhithanmaaril thalavanaaya maar barsaummaayum, maar shemavon desthuniyum theranyedukkappetta maar abahaayum yaldo maar basseliyosum malangkarayile parishuddhanmaaraaya maar greegoriyosum maar deevannaasyosum aaya nyangallude pithaakkanmaareyum chovullllathum kuttamillaatthathumaaya ekavishvaasatthe paalichu nyangallkku elppichuthannavaraayi ivarude mumpum, ivarodukoodeyum, ivarude sheshamullllavareyum nyangall orkkunnu. Avarude praarththhana namukku kottayaayirikkatte. Kartthaavinodu naam praarththhikkanam.

items.content: Shushrooshakkaaran: Baarekmor. Shlaihikavum kuttamillaatthathumaaya ekavishvaasatthe paalichu nyangallkku elpichuthannavaraayi, shuddhimaanmaarude sthhalatthu shuddhathayode mumpukootti nidrapraapichu vishramikkunnavareyum, nikhyaayilum kusthanteenopoleesilum, eppesosilum vachundaaya punyappettavayum, parishuddhangallumaaya moonnu pothusunnahadosukalleyum, avayil sambandhichavaraaya nyangallude pithaakkanmaareyum, oorshleminte onnaamatthe pradhaanaachaaryanaaya maar yaakkobum, maar ignaathyosu nooronoyum, maar apremum, kappadokyaayile maar basseliyosum, maar greegoriyosum, svarnnanaavukaaranaaya maar eevaaniyosum, alaksantriyaayile maar atthaanaasyosum, maar kooreelosum, maar deeyaskorosum maaboogile maar peelaksinosum, antyokhyaayile maar severiyosum, sroogile maar yaakkobum, maar yaakkobu burdaanaayum, maar baalaayiyum, yaldo maar basseliyosum, parumala maar greegoriyosum, sabhaabhaasuran geevargeesu maar deevannaasyosumaaya nyangallude pithaakkanmaareyum, shreshdham idayanmaaraayi malangkara sabhaye meyichu bharichavaraaya ellaa parishuddha pithaakkanmaareyum nyangall orkkunnu. Chovullllathum kuttamillaatthathumaaya eka vishvaasatthe paalichu nyangallkku elpichuthannavaraayi, ivarude mumpum, ivarodukoodeyum ivarude pimpullllavareyum nyangall orkkunnu. Avarude praarththhana namukku kottayaayirikkatte. Kartthaavinodu naam praarththhikkanam.
Janam : Kuriye-laaysson

content: Shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Aroopikalludeyum sakala jadangalludeyum udayavanaayirikkunna pithaavaam daivame, sathyavishvaasatthil munkootti nidrapraapichu vishramichu ninte adukkal vannuchernnavaraaya ee parishuddha madbahaayil ninnum ee palllliyilninnum ee sthhalatthuninnum, ellaa bhaagangallilninnum snehatthodum sathyavishvaasatthodum koodi vaangippoyirikkunna vishvaasikallaaya sakala marichupoyavareyum nyangall orkkunnu. Avarude aathmaakkalleyum aroopikalleyum thante adukkalekku edutthukondavanaaya nammude daivamaaya mashihaayodu dhaaraallamaaya thante anugrahangallmoolam kadangallude parihaaratthinum, paapamochanatthinum avare yogyaraakkuvaanum nammeyum avareyum thante svargaraajyatthil chertthukolllluvaanumaayi naam apekshichu praarththhichu moonnu praavashyam kuriyelaayisson ennu attahasichu parayanam.

Janam :- (daivame!) sathyavishvaasatthodukoodi nyangallilninnu vaangippoyirikkunna sakala marichavareyum nee aashvasippichu punyappedutthaname. Manassodum manassukoodaatheyum arivodum arivu koodaatheyum ninte thirumumpil nyangallum avarum cheythupoyittulllla pizhakall kshamikkaname.
Janam : Aammeen. (thante thirunaamam) irunnaprakaaram thanne irikkukayum thalamura thalamurakallaayi sakala thalamurakallvareyum lokaalokangallollavum sthhithicheyyukayum cheyyunnu. Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran :- (padinyaarottu thirinyu rooshmaa cheythukond) valiyavanum nammude rakshakanumaaya yeshumashihaayaakunna daivatthinte karuna…

1. Anpudayo-ne nin vaathil
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Muttunnu-daa-sar naadam
Kuriye-laa-yisson.

4. Vaathil thura-nnee-praarththhanayin
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Naadam ke-tte-keedename.
Kuriye-laa-yisson.

5. Ninne villi-kku-nne naathhaa!
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Nin uthavi-kkaay-balaheenar.
Kuriye-laa-yisson

6. Nallavane - kaa-runyatthaal
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Nalkaname - yaa-chippukalle
Kuriye-laa-yisson.

7. Kartthaave - kaa-runyatthaal
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Kanivadiyaa-ril - cheyyename.
Kuriye-laa-yisson.

8. Nanmanira-nyaa-ne ente
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Thinmakalle - nee- orkkaruthe.
Kuriye-laa-yisson.

items.content:
1. Sraappikalle kandashaayaa
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Beskkudishaa-yil - ninmumpil.
Kuriye-laa-yisson.

2. Chirakukallaa-raa-rullllavaraay
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Eritheeyaa-maa-thmaakkallavar.
Kuriye-laa-yisson

3 kaanaayu vaan - nin-daivathvam
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Mukhamavar mu-du-nniru chirakaal.
Kuriye-laa-yisson

4 eriyaayvaan - nin jvaalayathil
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Iru chirakaa-le - kaalukallum
Kuriye-laa-yisson

5. Attahasi-kku-nniru chirakum
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Kottiyavar - ni-nnittevam.
Kuriye-laa-yisson

6. Parishuddhan nee - parishuddhan
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Parishuddhan - nee - daivasuthaa!
Kuriye-laa-yisson.

7. Parishuddhan - nee - nin pakkal
Haaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Nin bahumaa-nam - sthuthyamaho.
Kuriye-laa-yisson

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangalle, nirappinteyum samadhaanatthinteyum anugrahangalludeyum karunayudeyum duthinu ninte anugrahangallaal nyangall yogyaraayittheeraname ennu ellaayppozhum kartthaavinodu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- nyangallude kartthaave! Ninte karunayaal nyangallkku samgathiyaakkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangalle, pallllikallkku nirappum dayaraakallkku samaadhaanavum avayile pattakkaarkku nalla kaavalum avayude prajakallkku pushdiyulllla kaalavum undaakuvaanaayi ellaayppozhum kartthaavinodu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- kartthaave, ninte karunayaal nyangalle samaadhaanappedutthaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangalle, sathpravartthikallaalum neethiyulllla vedippaaya punyanadapadikallaalum daivatthinishdamulllla sathyakristhyaanikallaayirippaan ellaayppozhum kartthaavinodu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- kartthaave! Ninte karunayaal nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangalle, naamum nammude marichupoyavarum, nammude samooham okkeyum, kedaattha agniyilninnum, chaakaattha puzhuvilninnum, kadhinamaaya vedanayilninnum, kaypperiya karachililninnum, avasaanamillaattha pallukadiyilninnum rakshapeduvaanaayi ellaayppozhum kartthaavinodu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- kartthaave! Ninte sleebaayaal-nyangalle rakshikkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- shapikkappettavare, ningall ente adutthuninnu poyi dushdanmaareyum anyaayakkaareyum dahippikkunna agni avakaashamaayi anubhavichukolllluvin ennu idathubhaagatthullllavarodu parayunna kaypperiyathum, maranakaravumaaya shabdatthilninnu rakshapeduvaanaayi, ente sahodarangalle, ellaayppozhum kartthaavinodu naam apekshikkanam.
Janam :- nyangallude kartthaave! Ninte sleebaayaal nyangalle rakshikkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- ente pithaavinaal anugrahikkappettavare! Vannu akatthu praveshich, lokaarambhatthinu mumpu ningallkkaayi orukkappettirikkunna raajyam avakaashamaayi anubhavichukolllluvin ennu valathubhaagatthullllavarodu parayunna santoshakaramaaya shabdatthinu naam yogyaraayittheeruvaanaayi, ente sahodarangalle! Ellaayppozhum naam kartthaavinodu apekshikkanam.
Janam :- nyangallude kartthaave! Ninte krpayaal nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran : Nyangallude daivamaaya kartthaave, ninte anugrahangallaalum karunayaalum rogikallkku poornnasaukhyavum, nyerukkatthilirikkunnavarkku aashvaasavum bandhikkappettirikkunnavarkku viduthalum akale poyirikkunnavarkku thirichuvaravum sameepasthharkku kaavalum (nalkaname). Bhinnichirikkunnavarkku aikyavum snehavum chinnippoyirikkunnavarkku orumippum kaanaathepoyirikkunnavarkku kandetthalum vilapichirikkunnavarkku aashvaasavum ksheenichirikkunnavarkku vishramavum agathikallkku santushdiyum vidhavamaarkku manodhairyavum sahaayavum daridrarkku poshanavum samthrpthiyum paapikallkku poornnamochanavum (nalkaname). Aachaaryathvatthinu nalla unnathiyum shushrooshakarkku venmayum kodukkukayum ninte nirapp, bhoomiyile raajyangallil vaazhukayum yuddhangallkku othukkavum, marichavarkku aashvaasavum nyangallkku kadangalludeyum paapangalludeyum mochanavum nalkaname.
Janam :- nyangallude kartthaave, ninte krpayaal nyangallkku iva nalkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- sahodarangalle, veendum daivamaathaavaaya vishuddha mariyaaminekkurichum parishuddhanmaarekkurichum, vishvaasikallaaya marichupoyavarekkurichum nalla ormma undaakuvaanaayi ellaayppozhum kartthaavinodu naam praarththhikkanam.
Janam :- avarude praarththhana - namukku kottayaayirikkatte. Aammeen.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- nammude mashihaathampuraanodu nammudeyum, nammude maathaapithaakkalludeyum sahodari sahodaranmaarudeyum, nethaakkalludeyum gurukkanmaarudeyum, marichupoyavarudeyum anyonyam naam ororuttharudeyum aathmaakkallkkaayi dhaaraallamaayi anugrahangallum karunayum naam yaachichu. Veendum yaachikkukayum cheyyunnu. Sakalatthinum udayavanaayirikkunna pithaavaam daivatthe naam sthothram cheyyukayum thante ekaputhrane vandikkukayum jeevanulllla thante vishuddha roohaaye mahatthvappedutthukayum karunayullllavanaaya kartthaavinte thrkkaikallil nammude jeevane bharamelppichu thannodu anugrahangall yaachikkukayum cheyyanam.
Janam : Utthamanaayullllove, karuna thonni nyangallude mel anugraham cheyyaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran: Janmadinavum vivaahavaarshikavum aacharikkunna nammude maathaapithaakkallkkum sahodaree sahodaranmaarkkum vendi nammude kartthaavinodu dhaaraallamaayi anugrahangallum karunayum naam yaachichu. Veendum avarkku anugrahangall labhikkunnathinu vendiyum samaadhaanatthilum shaantiyilum avar jeevikkunna thinuvendiyum prathisandhikallil ninnum prathikoolathakallil ninnum avar kaatthukollllappedunnathinu vendiyum daivaraajyatthinte avakaashikall aakunnathinuvendiyum ellaayppozhum kartthaavinodu naam praarththhikkanam.
Janam : Nyangallude kartthaave, ninte krpayaal avarkku iva saujanyamaayi nalkaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran : Nyangallude kartthaave, ninte karunayaal bandhitharum rogikallum anaathharum daridrarum peedhitharum palatharam prayaasangallil valayunnavarumaaya ellaavareyum nee ortthukollllaname. Prathyekaal, ee dinangallil janmadinam aacharikkunna ninte makkalle nyangall thirusannidhiyil samarppikkunnu. Avarude jeevitham nirantaram ninne mahathvappedutthuvaanum snehatthilum santoshatthilum deerghaayussilum avar vallaruvaanum ninte krpa avarkku dhaaraallamaayi nalkaname. Avarodoppam vivaaha vaarshikam aacharikkunna ninte makkalleyum nyangall orkkunnu. Paraspara snehatthinteyum karuthalinteyum pangkaallitthatthinteyum aathmaavilla kudumba jeevithatthinte paripaavanatha kaatthusookshikkuvaan ninte sahaayam avarkku nee nalkaname.
Janam : Nyangallude kartthaave, ninte karunayaal avarude praarththhanakalle nee kellkkename.
